LanguageData.ClimateAdjustment.label: climate adjustment
LanguageData.ClimateAdjustment.description: A nearby climate adjuster is shifting the temperature.
LanguageData.ClimateAdjustment.letterText: A climate adjuster machine has begun shifting the temperature.
LanguageData.EMIField.label: EMI field
LanguageData.EMIField.description: An electromagnetic interference dynamo is projecting an EM interference field, disabling electrical devices.
LanguageData.EMIField.descriptionFuture: a distant EMI dynamo will blast [map_definite] with an EMI field, shutting down electrical devices for [gameConditionDuration_duration]
LanguageData.EMIField.letterText: An EMI field has been generated. It is disabling electrical devices.
LanguageData.GiantSmokeCloud.label: giant smoke cloud
LanguageData.GiantSmokeCloud.description: A nearby smoke spewer is reducing sunlight in this region.
LanguageData.GiantSmokeCloud.letterText: A smoke spewer machine has begun obscuring the sun.
LanguageData.PsychicSuppression.label: psychic suppression
LanguageData.PsychicSuppression.description: A psychic suppression field is affecting {0}s and reducing their consciousness. The effect is modulated by an individual's psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.PsychicSuppression.descriptionFuture: a psychic suppression wave will reduce the consciousness of all [psychicSuppressorGender]s around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration]
LanguageData.PsychicSuppression.endMessage: The psychic suppressor field has dissipated.
LanguageData.PsychicSuppression.letterText: A psychic suppressor field has begun reducing the consciousness of {0}s across the whole region. The effect is modulated by an individual's psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.SunBlocker.label: sun blocked
LanguageData.SunBlocker.description: A nearby sun blocker machine is turning the upper atmosphere opaque, blocking the sun.
LanguageData.SunBlocker.letterText: A sun blocker machine has begun blocking the sun.
LanguageData.ToxicSpewer.label: toxic spewer
LanguageData.ToxicSpewer.description: A nearby toxic spewer is blanketing this whole region with poison.
LanguageData.ToxicSpewer.letterText: A toxic spewer machine has begun blanketing the whole region with poison.
LanguageData.WeatherController.label: forced weather
LanguageData.WeatherController.description: A nearby weather controller is forcing the weather into this configuration.
LanguageData.WeatherController.descriptionFuture: a weather-control system will force the weather around [map_definite] to be [forcedWeather_indefinite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration]
LanguageData.WeatherController.endMessage: The weather controller is no longer changing the weather.
LanguageData.WeatherController.letterText: A weather controller machine has begun affecting the weather.
